code: import React,{useCallback}from'react';import List from'@material-ui/core/List';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{getProductsInCart}from'../redux/users/selector';import CartListItem from'../components/Products/CartListItem';import{GreyButton,PrimaryButton}from'../components/UIkit';import{push}from'connected-react-router';import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/styles';var useStyles=makeStyles({root:{margin:'0 auto',maxWidth:512,width:'100%'}});var CartList=function CartList(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var classes=useStyles();var selector=useSelector(function(state){return state;});var productInCart=getProductsInCart(selector);var goToOrder=useCallback(function(){dispatch(push('/order/confirm'));},[dispatch]);var backToHome=useCallback(function(){dispatch(push('/'));},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("section",{className:"c-section-wrapin"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h2",{className:"u-text__headline"},"\u30B7\u30E7\u30C3\u30D4\u30F3\u30B0\u30AB\u30FC\u30C8"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(List,{className:classes.root},productInCart.length>0&&productInCart.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CartListItem,{key:product.cartId,product:product});})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"module-spacer--medium"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"p-grid__column"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(PrimaryButton,{label:'レジへ進む',onClick:goToOrder}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"module-spacer--extra-small"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(GreyButton,{label:"ショッピングを続ける",onClick:backToHome})));};export default CartList;
